verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> that came to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, after <S%H310><s%> that Nebuzar <S%H5018><s%>â€“adan the captain <S%H7227><s%> of the guard <S%H2876><s%> had let him go <S%H7971><s%> from Ramah <S%H7414><s%>, when he had taken <S%H3947><s%> him being bound <S%H631><s%> in chains <S%H246><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> all that were carried away captive <S%H1546><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and Judah <S%H3063><s%>, which were carried away captive <S%H1540><s%> unto Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

And now <S%H6605><s%>, behold, I loose you this day <S%H3117><s%> from the chains <S%H246><s%> which were upon your hand <S%H3027><s%>. If it seem good <S%H2896><s%> unto you to come <S%H935><s%> with me into Babylon <S%H894><s%>, come <S%H935><s%>; and I will look well <S%H7760><s%> unto you <S%H7489><s%>: but if it seem ill unto you to come <S%H935><s%> with me into Babylon <S%H894><s%>, forbear <S%H2308><s%>: behold <S%H7200><s%>, all the land <S%H776><s%> is before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H413><s%>: where it seems good <S%H2896><s%> and convenient <S%H3477><s%> for you to go <S%H3212><s%>, there go <S%H3212><s%>.

Now while he was not yet gone back <S%H7725><s%>, he said <S%H7725><s%>, Go back also to Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam <S%H296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphan <S%H8227><s%>, whom the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> has made governor <S%H6485><s%> over the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and live <S%H3427><s%> with him among <S%H8432><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>: or go <S%H3212><s%> wheresoever it seems convenient <S%H3477><s%> unto you to go <S%H3212><s%>. So the captain <S%H7227><s%> of the guard <S%H2876><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> him food <S%H737><s%> and a reward <S%H4864><s%>, and let him go <S%H7971><s%>.

Then went <S%H935><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> unto Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam <S%H296><s%> to Mizpah <S%H4708><s%>; and lived <S%H3427><s%> with him among <S%H8432><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that were left <S%H7604><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>.

Now when all the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the forces <S%H2428><s%> which were in the fields <S%H7704><s%>, even they and their men <S%H582><s%>, heard <S%H8085><s%> that the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> had made Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam <S%H296><s%> governor <S%H6485><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, and had committed <S%H6485><s%> unto him men <S%H582><s%>, and women <S%H802><s%>, and sons <S%H2945><s%>, and of the poor <S%H1803><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, of them that were not carried away captive <S%H1540><s%> to Babylon <S%H894><s%>;

And Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam <S%H296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphan <S%H8227><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto them and to their men <S%H582><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Fear <S%H3372><s%> not to serve <S%H5647><s%> the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%>: live in <S%H3427><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and it shall be well with you <S%H3190><s%>.

As for me <S%H3427><s%>, behold, I will live at Mizpah <S%H4709><s%> to serve <S%H5975><s%> the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%>, which will come <S%H935><s%> unto us <S%H622><s%>: but you, gather you wine <S%H3196><s%>, and summer fruits <S%H7019><s%>, and oil <S%H8081><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> them in your vessels <S%H3627><s%>, and live <S%H3427><s%> in your cities <S%H5892><s%> that you have taken <S%H8610><s%>.

Likewise when all the Jews <S%H3064><s%> that were in Moab <S%H4124><s%>, and among the Ammonites <S%H5983><s%>, and in Edom <S%H123><s%>, and that were in all the countries <S%H776><s%>, heard <S%H8085><s%> that the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> had left <S%H5414><s%> a remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and that he had set <S%H6485><s%> over them Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam <S%H296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphan <S%H8227><s%>;

Even all the Jews <S%H3064><s%> returned out <S%H7725><s%> of all places <S%H4725><s%> where they were driven <S%H5080><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, to Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%>, unto Mizpah <S%H4708><s%>, and gathered <S%H622><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> and summer fruits <S%H7019><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7235><s%>.

Moreover Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kareah <S%H7143><s%>, and all the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the forces <S%H2428><s%> that were in the fields <S%H7704><s%>, came <S%H935><s%> to Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> to Mizpah <S%H4708><s%>,

And said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3045><s%>, Do you certainly know <S%H3045><s%> that Baalis <S%H1185><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of the Ammonites <S%H1121><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nethaniah <S%H5418><s%> to kill <S%H5221><s%> you <S%H1436><s%>? But Gedaliah the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam <S%H296><s%> believed them not <S%H539><s%>.

Then Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kareah <S%H7143><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> in Mizpah <S%H4709><s%> secretly <S%H5643><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Let me go <S%H3212><s%>, I pray you <S%H5221><s%>, and I will kill Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nethaniah <S%H5418><s%>, and no man <S%H376><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> it <S%H5221><s%>: therefore should he kill you <S%H3064><s%>, that all the Jews which are gathered <S%H6908><s%> unto you should be scattered <S%H6327><s%>, and the remnant <S%H7611><s%> in Judah <S%H3063><s%> perish <S%H6><s%>?

But Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam <S%H296><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kareah <S%H7143><s%>, You shall not do <S%H6213><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%>: for you speak <S%H1696><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%> of Ishmael <S%H3458><s%>.
